quotes.quote: Good communication is as stimulating as black coffee and just as hard to sleep after.
quotes.author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quotes.quote: Every improvement in communication makes the bore more terrible.
quotes.author: Frank Moore Colby

quotes.quote: The constant free flow of communication amount us-enabling the free interchange of ideas-forms the very bloodstream of our nation. It keeps the mind and body of our democracy eternally vital, eternally young.
quotes.author: Judith Martin

quotes.quote: Let us make a special effort to stop communicating with each other, so we can have some conversation.
quotes.author: Tom Lehrer

quotes.quote: I wish people who have trouble communicating would just shut up.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.quote: Think like a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.
